title: The DePaul Art Museum  |  Student Life  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Student Life Life at DePaul Student Organizations Housing Virtual Campus Tour Student Orientation DeBlogs Career Center Athletics Art Museum Student Affairs Bookstore Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Student Life>Art Museum The DePaul Art Museum A world-class museum on your campus Some of the world’s most famous museums are just a train ride away, but one of the leading contemporary art museums in Chicago is right on your campus—and it’s free! DePaul Art Museum (DPAM) connects people through art and ideas while highlighting international, national, and local artists historically marginalized from museum spaces, like women artists, artists of color and LGBTQIA+ artists. Showcasing work from emerging to well-established artists from Chicago and beyond, DPAM is your resource for connecting with your city in creative and innovative ways! Over 4,000 works in our permanent collection 2-4 exhibitionseach year Free programs, talks, workshops, and screenings Custom tours of the permanent collection Visit the DPAM websiteBrowse the collection online
